title.value: Экономическая эффективность возделывания сортообразцов узколистного и желтого люпина на семена
Economic efficiency of blue and yellow lupine variety samples growing for seeds

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Valyuzhenich, V.A., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented results of research into evaluation of variety samples of blue lupine (Lupinus angustifolius) and yellow lupine (Lupinus luleus) according to yielding capacity and elements of yield structure, and also shown economic efficiency of cultivation new variety samples for seeds. There was selected a number of samples with high seed productivity and profitability of growing for seed of more than 40%. As a result of the realized studied there was given a thorough evaluation of the created variety samples in accordance with their yielding capacity and economic efficiency. Variety samples of blue lupine Pershatsvet x BSHA 280-50, Vladlen-18 showed yield increases in comparison with standard – 3.4-7.1 centner/ha, samples of yellow lupine Zhemchug-5, Prestizh-13, 57-09, BSHA 433-38 – yield increase up to 3.4-5.4 centner/ha. Variety samples OVS-P-1 – OVS-P-6 and 59-09 in course of 1,5 years of experimental period exceeded the appropriate standards by yielding capacity and its elements.
